structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Clerks, Attorneys And Other Officers Of Judicial Courts

law.catch_line: Failure To Pay Clientâ€™S Money; Penalty
law.text: An attorney at law who unreasonably neglects to pay over money collected by him for and in behalf of a client, when demanded by the client, shall forfeit to such client five times the lawful interest of the money from the time of the demand.
